mapper.sql: ID, INVESTOR_NO, INVESTOR_NAME, DEPT_NAME, FIX_PROPORTION, DAILY_RIGHTS, INTEREST_AMOUNT, TRADE_DATE_STR, TRADE_DATE, DATE_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, AVAILABLE_FUNDS, RIGHTS, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, MEDIATOR_NO, MEDIATOR_NAME, MARKET_NO, MARKET_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into T_REPORT_REBATE (ID, INVESTOR_NO, INVESTOR_NAME, DEPT_NAME, FIX_PROPORTION, DAILY_RIGHTS, INTEREST_AMOUNT, TRADE_DATE_STR, TRADE_DATE, DATE_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, AVAILABLE_FUNDS, RIGHTS, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, MEDIATOR_NO, MEDIATOR_NAME, MARKET_NO, MARKET_NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyRights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interestAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDateStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{availableFunds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,

mapper.update:
update T_REPORT_REBATE
INVESTOR_NO = #{investorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTOR_NAME = #{investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIX_PROPORTION = #{fixProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAILY_RIGHTS = #{dailyRights,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEREST_AMOUNT = #{interestAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_DATE_STR = #{tradeDateStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_DATE = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATE_TYPE = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVAILABLE_FUNDS = #{availableFunds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHTS = #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATOR_NO = #{mediatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATOR_NAME = #{mediatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_NO = #{marketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_NAME = #{marketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_REPORT_REBATE set INVESTOR_NO = #{investorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVESTOR_NAME = #{investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIX_PROPORTION = #{fixProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAILY_RIGHTS = #{dailyRights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEREST_AMOUNT = #{interestAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_DATE_STR = #{tradeDateStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_DATE = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATE_TYPE = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVAILABLE_FUNDS = #{availableFunds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHTS = #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATOR_NO = #{mediatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATOR_NAME = #{mediatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKET_NO = #{marketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKET_NAME = #{marketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME,t.MEDIATOR_NAME,t.DEPT_NAME,sum(t.AVAILABLE_FUNDS) as AVAILABLE_FUNDS, to_char(sum(t.INTEREST_AMOUNT),'fm9999999999990.0099') as INTEREST_AMOUNT from T_REPORT_REBATE t
to_char(t.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DEPT_NAME like '%'||#{depName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
group by t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME,t.MEDIATOR_NAME,t.DEPT_NAME

select t.DEPT_NAME,sum(t.AVAILABLE_FUNDS) as AVAILABLE_FUNDS, to_char(sum(t.INTEREST_AMOUNT),'fm9999999999990.0099') as INTEREST_AMOUNT from T_REPORT_REBATE t
to_char(t.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DEPT_NAME like '%'||#{depName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
group by t.DEPT_NAME
